name: Stick Ninja Jump - stickman endless tap run and jumping adventure
name_original: Stick Ninja Jump - stickman endless tap run and jumping adventure
description:
Every Ninja needs to make a good getaway…
Avoid the obstacles to score as many points as possible!!!

Help the Ninja to jump from building to building...

[ How to play ]
- tap screen to jump
- tap again to double jump
- avoid colored buildings...

Download it now…
And Enjoy the game!!!
